about_the_game:
Samozbor ID:HEAVEN is a First Person Shooter where your goal is to breach enemy lines and get right into heart of insurgency.

You take the role of Asya Burjueva who got banished from teaparty and had to go alone through darkest Siberian forests against entire rebellion force.

Make your passage through 15 stages (5 in demo) of hostile territories. Fight rebel occultists, their allies and army of beast minions. Take advantage of arsenal of exotic weapons of destruction.

Be wary about nighttime! Unspoken horrors come to ripe the skalenium gear out of your very flesh.

Stop them before they open gates of Samozbor!

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains violence, blood and gore.

Samozbor ID:HEAVEN is a First Person Shooter where your goal is to breach enemy lines and get right into heart of insurgency.

You take the role of Asya Burjueva who got banished from teaparty and had to go alone through darkest Siberian forests against entire rebellion force.

Make your passage through 15 stages (5 in demo) of hostile territories. Fight rebel occultists, their allies and army of beast minions. Take advantage of arsenal of exotic weapons of destruction.

Be wary about nighttime! Unspoken horrors come to ripe the skalenium gear out of your very flesh.

Stop them before they open gates of Samozbor!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64 bit
  • Processor: Athlon 200ge
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vega 3
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64 bit
  • Processor: Ryzen5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 5500
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

name: Samozbor ID:HEAVEN Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Athlon 200ge
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vega 3
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen5 3600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 5500
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Breach enemy stronghold in dread Siberian wastelands before insurgents can open gates to Samozbor dimension.
